Articles.Content:
This is kinda of a challenge, but it is more of a discussion. So here it is.

Without, time warp, but with unlimited fuel cheat. Travel to Duna.

How long does it take you? Was the mission satisfying? Would this be away to do multi-player? Is this even the same game?

*Cough... Where's your attempt?

Also, how do we rate ours?

hm...

wait till duna is close, and then launch

a 1man pod with no fuel tank and a Novapunch 5m 7500kN engine will be your ship...

i think it wont take too long... lemme try...

I managed to reach Eve on less than two days with an Orion, note this was not burn all the way, but probably 10 minutes with the largest bombs.

Even managed to aerobrake, however the 70000g braking ripped the rcs tanks of the ship making it imposible to rotate so I could get into orbit.

With an longer burn with higher twr it should be possible, however your main issue is that you would have to start braking then halfway. You will travel faster than mine 1.000.000 m/s and Duna is not suited for extreme high speed aerobrake who would probably wreck your ship anyway.

There's no point to bring up multiplayer yet again, please refer to What not to suggest.

If you want to make a challenge then feel free to do so, but in that case please do so in the challenge subforum and read the challenge submission guidelines before posting it.

With that said, thread closed.
